short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper for Tasks in Articulate Rise

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides support for various activities in Articulate Rise https://rise.articulate.com , like : 
1. All the courses in the dashboard page can be exported as CSV
